definition: to pass an entrance exam/to be admitted to
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to take/to get/to choose/to fetch

sentences.english: He entered Harward University, a university that many people dream of.
sentences.chinese: 他考取了哈佛大学，一所许多人都向往的大学。

sentences.english: The Reds midfielder is undecided whether he will follow team-mate Jamie Carragher by taking his coaching badges.
sentences.chinese: 红军队长还未决定是否跟随队友卡拉格考取教练证书。

sentences.english: He is also admitted to practice in the United States of America, and has practiced American law for over 25 years.
sentences.chinese: 谢博士也考取美国律师并执行美国律师业务逾25年。

sentences.english: I'm doing my coaching badges now with Ole Gunnar Solskjaer and Giggsy.
sentences.chinese: 目前我正与索尔斯克亚和吉格斯在考取教练证书。

sentences.english: Luckily , in 2004 , i was admitted into peking union medicalcollege , majoring anesthesiology.
sentences.chinese: 2004年顺利考取了中国协和医科大学麻醉学专业。

sentences.english: Ms. Schutz suggests going back to school or earning certifications to bolster a resume.
sentences.chinese: 舒茨建议重返学校或考取一些证书充实简历。

sentences.english: And talent as a friend to pass him, and he has failed the Wets .
sentences.chinese: 而才华不如他的朋友考取了，而他这位才子竟落榜。

sentences.english: I'm planning to get a scuba diving licence.
sentences.chinese: 我计划去考取一个佩带水肺潜水的证书。

sentences.english: I wish to congratulate you on your daughter's finishing high school and successfully entering the university.
sentences.chinese: 谨祝贺您的女儿高中毕业并顺利考取大学。

sentences.english: Possess or able to obtain a valid lifeguard certification.
sentences.chinese: 拥有或能够考取有效救生员证者最佳。

sentences.english: All ( the ) students in the class passed the exam.
sentences.chinese: 这一班的学生全都考取了。

sentences.english: Quite a few of them have passed the entrance examination and will become the state---sanctioned postgraduates in our school.
sentences.chinese: 他们之中有部分教师考取我院国家统招的硕士研究生。

sentences.english: In the second year of university, I obtained the tourist certificate.
sentences.chinese: 在大学的第二年，我还考取了导游证。

sentences.english: Now my plan is to be a senior engineer.
sentences.chinese: 我目前的规划只到了考取高级工程师这一步。

sentences.english: I am writing to offer my sincere congratulations on your graduation from senior school and enrollment by the Peking University.
sentences.chinese: 我写信是想衷心祝贺你高中毕业并考取北京大学。

definition: to pass a university entrance exam
to gain entry by passing an exam/to be admitted to (a college etc)
to pass entrance exam/to enter college after a competitive exam
to enter oneself for an examination
to pursue one's studies
to major (in a field)/to study a specialty to obtain a higher degree
to pass an exam
undergraduate course/undergraduate (attributive)
to beat/to hit/variant of 考[kao3]/to inspect/to test/to take an exam
to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father
to accept an applicant (prospective student, employee etc) who passes an entrance exam/to admit (a student)/to hire (a job candidate)
to undertake advanced studies/to take a refresher course
to attend (a school)/to drop out (of college etc)
master's degree
graduate student/postgraduate student/research student
to pass (an exam)
to go to school
